import React, { useState } from "react" import { useAuth } from "../contexts/AuthContext" import { Card, Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap" import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom" import {MedicationRibbon} from "./MedicationRibbon" export default function Medications() { const [error, setError] = useState("") const { currentUser, logout } = useAuth() const history = useHistory() async function handleLogout() { setError("") try { await logout() history.push("/login") } catch { setError("Failed to log out") } } return ( <> My Medications You do not have any pending medications!


Insulin Two shots a day Controls the amount of sugar in the blood by moving it into the cells, where it can be used by the body for energy. For my Type 2 Diabetes.

Carbamazepine Up to 4 times a day Used to prevent and control seizures, anticonvulsant. * Conflicts with Asthma Inhaler, do not take within 4 hours of eachother

Asthma Inhaler As needed Oral inhalation is used to prevent difficulty breathing, chest tightness, wheezing, and coughing. corticosteroids. ) }
